Reviews.Title: Good!!
Reviews.Author: Angelica Roa
Reviews.Content: Is really cute, a very good phone. is easy to use. i but it for my mom and she is happy

Reviews.Title: This phone is underrated
Reviews.Author: Leonardo Carvajal G. "Leito"
Reviews.Content: Personally, i think people's rate on this brand is inaccurate and unfair. Also I don't think BB phones should be compared with iPhones because they are totally different devices.If you don't feel ready to jump directly to a touchscreen phone this is your perfect fit. If you work with emails, web browsing on the go, documents edition and so forth, again this is the perfect match. People's complains about the lack of apps as the BB's weakness have been solved since the new OS was released a couple weeks ago. Now you can install Android apps without a problem directly on your BB10.For me, this is the perfect combination between a powerful working tool, and an excellent entertainment device. You can watch movies from your phone directly to your HD TV with one touch and many other things.This is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Clearly not a "new" phone
Reviews.Author: Teresa Lockhart
Reviews.Content: This item is sold as a new item, However it has Verizon logo and did not have all the components that are supposed to be in the box. This item was missing the headphones and cables and battery were clearly repackaged. I believe this may have been a refurbished or returned item. I am not taking a chance on this item so it is being returned.

Reviews.Title: absolutely not new
Reviews.Author: alertcon4
Reviews.Content: very very disappointed...it is not new, it has scratches on surface...very poor condition...I will not buy thru here for blackberry any more...

Reviews.Title: BB10 must have
Reviews.Author: Andres Lezama
Reviews.Content: I didn't receive it yet but, blackberry 10 is amazing I will update and write  a review of the supplier , it is an amazing device with outstanding battery life and performance , not to mention the new 10.2.1 update with all the apps you will ever need , great phone

Reviews.Title: Best keyboard
Reviews.Author: catmom
Reviews.Content: Rarely have had any item delivered so quickly.  Reluctant to use a touch screen phone and needed to upgrade from the Blackberry Curve so the Q is ideal.  Unable to find it so easily in white and appreciate that you were able to deliver.

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry for life
Reviews.Author: Cecly Ann Mitchell
Reviews.Content: What can I say? I am a BlackBerry addict (self confessed) and not ashamed to say so. I love my phone. Some people (Z10) users always ask how I manage the keyboard? Easy I manage it just fine. This phone is worth every single penny I paid for it.

Reviews.Title: oh my gosh...
Reviews.Author: Lee Yoonju
Reviews.Content: i'm very disappointed in your product.It does not have all the components.In addition, this is version of verizon!this is not a complete package. so it looks like an open one.you didn't mention this fact at all.I will not buy from you again.again, I want to tell that I am disappointed to you.bye

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Ryan Persaud "ryan"
Reviews.Content: One of the best phones BlackBerry has made so far. It has Skype an a good battery life. Screen is reasonable big and the multitasking is good!

Reviews.Title: Best business phone
Reviews.Author: Barry Bowman
Reviews.Content: Just the business phone I needed with the power of 4g. Very versatile, compact, great photos and videos, handles emails well, and long battery life.

Reviews.Title: Love BB and love BB Q10
Reviews.Author: Kema
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. It was brand new - no cell phone name brand and it was unlocked. I started using it the day I got it and so happy I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Aghogho jakpor
Reviews.Content: It works so well, haven't have any issue with it since we got it. Fast delivery just as p promised. It even came with a courtesy case for the phone.

Reviews.Title: First time using BB, I love it!
Reviews.Author: Renata Cheng
Reviews.Content: Evrything is ok but a little dirt on surface. It's ok. First time for me using Blackberry, I love it !

Reviews.Title: My Blackberry Q10 order.
Reviews.Author: FADY ISKANDER
Reviews.Content: Nice phone & I got it on time whis the best customer service adviser help line provide you with accurate information.

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: YUJEONG LEE
Reviews.Content: it's NOT in new condition....it was already opened and they installed screen protectors of device.and It's 100-2 version..............so I returned it. .

Reviews.Title: GREAT PHONE
Reviews.Author: temmybaby
Reviews.Content: ITS NICE ,BCOS THE BATTERY LASTS LONGER BEFORE U NEED TO CHARGE IT,AGAIN,I WOULD TELL MY PALS TO BUY IT.

Reviews.Title: not a new item like posted
Reviews.Author: Kai Lin
Reviews.Content: it seems like open box item, not a brand new.. because after i open the package I found it is not a original pack......

Reviews.Title: Fast Delivery, Perfect As Described
Reviews.Author: NewYorkRoger
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy to rate this vendor and the product as EXCELLENT.  Delivery within 24hours, and the phone works perfectly on AT&T...; I totally recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: chael Charles
Reviews.Content: was hesitant purchasing but it worked perfect in the Cayman islands. no issues whatsoever. luv this phone, also purchased the clear case for it and it was great also
